song.englishname: In Love With The 80's (Pink Tux To The Prom)

english.segment1: So it was jeremy in 1983. in his ocean pacific t. who got a bloody knee. on his skateboard. in the half pipe. in the backyard. that tuesday night
english.segment2: and i'm only gonna pierce my left ear. and i've been working on this mustache all summer long. and my favorite band will always be tears for fears. and i'm gonna wear a pink tux to the prom
english.segment3: cutting class through the first floor window. he's driving fast cause he never did a thing slow. and i look up to my big bro. cause in the 80's all the ladies grabbed his hand and couldn't let go
english.segment4: and i'm only gonna pierce my left ear. and i've been working on this mustache all summer long. and my favorite band will always be tears for fears. and i'm gonna wear a pink tux to the prom (a pink tux to the prom)
english.segment5: doo doo, a doo doo doo. pink tux to the prom. doo doo, a doo doo doo. pink tux to the prom
english.segment6: i am gonna wear a pink tux to the prom. live without a care..what could possibly go wrong?
english.segment7: when you're president of the breakfast club. and you're not hesitant to fall in love (to fall in love). to throw it away to fall in love with the 80's
english.segment8: i am gonna wear a pink tux to the prom. live without a care..what could possibly go wrong?. i am gonna wear a pink tux to the prom. live without a care.. cause you threw it away to fall in love with the 80's
english.segment9: doo doo, a doo doo. doo doo, a doo doo. doo doo, a doo doo
